resources.string: After clicking, a label will appear with which you can make parking. Also, you can leave notes or photos.
After parking the car, you can look at the note that you left.
Click to plot a route from you to the car.
The camera is not available. There is no way to use the camera to create a photo.\n
To use all the functionality of the application, allow access to geolocation and camera.
Allow using the camera in the settings
Enable geolocation in your phone settings so that the app will show your location
Changes will take effect after restarting

When parking:
 → Determine which entrance you came from and roughly estimate the distance from it
 → If there is a detailed drawing of the parking lot/shopping center where you are located on the maps, use reference points (for example, entrances/exits from the parking lot/ shopping center where you are located) to put a marker with high accuracy
 → If the parking lot uses the marking of places, write down/take a picture of the number of the place where you parked your car
 → When photographing a car, try to capture the reference points
 → When writing a note, do not forget to specify the floor where the car is located and the time of entry to the parking lot, if it is paid
 
 When searching for a car:
 → Try to follow the same path to the car as you left it
 → If there is a marking of places in the parking lot, use it: standing at the nearest marker, find any marker that is diagonally away from you (one place forward and one place to the side) - so you will understand which way you need to move to find your car
 → If geolocation services are not working well in your parking lot, do not rely on an automatically built route - it can confuse you
